song.verse: No more champagne And the fireworks are through Here we are, me and you Feeling lost and feeling blue It′s the end of the party And the morning seems so grey So unlike yesterday Now′s the time for us to say...
song.chorus: Happy new year Happy new year May we all have a vision now and then Of a world where every neighbour is a friend Happy new year Happy new year May we all have our hopes, our will to try If we don′t we might as well lay down and die You and I
song.verse: Sometimes I see How the brave new world arrives And I see how it thrives In the ashes of our lives Oh yes, man is a fool And he thinks he′ll be okay Dragging on, feet of clay Never knowing he′s astray Keeps on going anyway...
